hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOOI.ORG_ID, EOOI.EOOI_CODE, EOOB.EOOR_CUSTOMER_CODE, EOOB.EOOR_EOSM_PM_CODE, NVL(SUM(EOOI.EOOI_QUANTITY),0) EOOI_QUANTITY FROM EO_ORDER_BUSINESS EOOB LEFT JOIN EO_ORDER_ITEM EOOI ON EOOB.EOOR_ORDER_NO = EOOI.EOOI_ORDER_NO AND EOOB.ORG_ID = EOOB.ORG_ID WHERE 1=1 AND EOOI.REC_STATUS=0 AND EOOI.EOOI_CODE IS NOT NULL AND EOOB.EOOR_CUSTOMER_CODE IS NOT NULL AND EOOB.EOOR_EOSM_PM_CODE IS NOT NULL <<AND EOOI.EOOI_ORDER_NO in(:eooiOrderNos)>> <<AND EOOI.EOOI_ORDER_NO LIKE :eooiOrderNo>> GROUP BY EOOI.ORG_ID, EOOI.EOOI_CODE,EOOB.EOOR_CUSTOMER_CODE,EOOB.EOOR_EOSM_PM_CODE
